tasks.name: Create a crypto wallet & connect it to this app 📲
tasks.description: During the “Activate your Wallet and Complete Quests” Workshop: • Install the Zerion mobile app. • Create a wallet. • Connect your wallet to this app. Where? During the Workshop in the Auditorium ⚒️

tasks.name: Setup your ‘New to Web3’ profile
tasks.description: Once you’re ready with your wallet: • Go to your profile here in the app. • Choose a username, an emoji avatar 🐇 , your role (Explorer or Mentor) and your email (optional). Where? During the Workshop in the Auditorium ⚒️

tasks.name: Claim the ‘New to Web3’ event POAP
tasks.description:
It’s time to get your first POAP! 

POAP, short for "Proof of Attendance Protocol," allows you to mint memories as digital mementos. This POAP celebrates your attendance to this event 🐇

Where? Hosts will share instructions on how to claim it live during the Workshop in the Auditorium  ⚒️ 
Also at Booth #3 if you missed the Workshop.

tasks.name: Join the event group on Telegram or LINE
tasks.description:
• Join the event social group on Line or Telegram. 
Both work, but if you’re familiar with Telegram, consider this option.
• Get ready to share your achievements with the community!

Where? During the Workshop in the Auditorium  ⚒️

tasks.name: Claim ETH & USDC on Base
tasks.description: • Click the “Claim” button to receive 0.000555 ETH and 2 USDC on Base.

tasks.name: Hold 1 USDGLO on Optimism 🔴
tasks.description:
• Connect your wallet to yodl.me inside your Zerion wallet browser.
• Select RECEIVE 
• Toggle on “Only Sponsored” to avoid network fees
• Generate a QR code to receive 2 USDGLO
• Present your QR Code to Booth Leads
• Get your code scanned and receive tokens

Where? At Booth #1 Send and Receive Digital Assets

tasks.name: Swap 2 USDC for ETH on Base
tasks.description:
• Click the “Swap” button here in the app.
• In the pop-up, select “Swap”.
• Swap 2 USDC for ETH. This can be done in two steps, first Approve, then the actual Swap.
💡 Not sure how to do this step? Find a Mentor and ask for help! They will happy to guide you.
• Click “Verify” to manually validate task.

Where? No special booth, recommended to do before visiting Booth #2.

tasks.name: Mint ‘Vibrant Roots of Renewal’ NFT on Base 🎨
tasks.description: • Meet Lianna Adams, our guest NFT artist. • Mint your first NFT on Base chain and become a collector! 🔒 Requirement: have at least 0.000111 ETH Where? Booth #2 Create and Mint Digital Collectibles 🎨

tasks.name: Claim Web3 Explorer POAP with Bankless Academy 🧑🏻‍🚀
tasks.description:
• Learn about Bankless Academy, a free educational platform to learn web3 with beginner friendly lessons.
 • Claim the special POAP for visiting the booth.

Where? Booth #3 Become a Web3 Explorer 🧑🏻‍🚀

tasks.name: Claim Protect Your Wallet POAP with Harpie 🔥
tasks.description:
•  Learn about Wallet Security with the Harpie team.
 •  Claim the special POAP for visiting the booth.

Where? Booth #4 Protect Your Wallet with Harpie 🔥

tasks.name: Claim Global Changemakers POAP 🌱
tasks.description:
• Discover regenerative communities in Web3 like Regens Unite, ReFi DAO, and others, and learn how to get involved in these global movements.
• Scan the QR code to find the landing page.
• Fill out the form on the page.
• Claim the special POAP for visiting the booth.

Where? Booth #5 Unite with Global Changemakers 🌱

tasks.name: Claim Fund Your Project Onchain POAP 🚀
tasks.description:
•  Learn about open source, public goods and fundraising platforms Gitcoin and Giveth.
• Claim the special POAP for visiting the booth.

Where? Booth #6 Fund Your Project Onchain 🚀

tasks.name: Claim Join a DAO POAP 🤝🏻
tasks.description: • Learn about decentralized communities and how PizzaDAO is onboarding new friends to web3, through pizza. • Join PizzaDAO on Discord. • Claim the special POAP for visiting the booth. Where? Booth #7 Join a DAO 🍕

tasks.name: Bonus: Own a Base domain name 💫
tasks.description:
Congratulations on making it this far! 🎉 Let’s create a personalized name for your wallet address. This will be easier to remember and is also safer to use.
• Go to https://www.base.org/names
• Buy .base.eth domain name
• Set domain as Primary Name

🔒 Requirements: have at least 0.001 ETH to buy a 5+ letter domain name, example: myname.base.eth

booths.name: Send & Receive Digital Assets
booths.description: Experience your first P2P transactions with no intermediaries.

booths.name: Create & Mint NFTs
booths.description: Discover how to mint and create unique digital collectibles on the blockchain.

booths.name: Become a Web3 Explorer
booths.description: Earn onchain certifications while learning with beginner-friendly lessons.

booths.name: Protect Your Wallet
booths.description: Learn tips on how to keep your digital assets safe.

booths.name: Unite with Global Changemakers
booths.description: Connect with regenerative communities driving positive change in Web3.

booths.name: Fund your Project Onchain
booths.description: Learn how to launch and fund your idea on the blockchain.

booths.name: Join a DAO
booths.description: Learn how decentralized communities use the blockchain for better coordination.

program.title: Humans of Web3
program.people: Ornella Vallana, Luke Cassady-Dorion, Caolán Walsh, Guil Maueler

program.title: How to Protect Your Wallet: Simple Tips for Good Security
program.people: Britt Mier y Terán from Harpie

program.title: Activate Your Wallet and Quest Intro
